'''0.27 SURVIVAL TEST'''<ref>[[wordofnotch:222885464|Snowman on #minecraft irc made this snow mod. Looks really nice!]] – The Word of Notch, October 25, 2009</ref><ref>{{ytl|_t7BBGvyIWc|Minecraft Update Vlog #1||Errrki - Oct 28, 2009}}</ref> is a version of [[Survival Test]] released on October 24, 2009. It is the last version of Survival Test.<ref>[[wordofnotch:221349730|Survival mode updated, free testing for everyone!]] – The Word of Notch, October 24, 2009</ref> This version is not available in the launcher, but has been archived elsewhere.

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Lava JE7.png|32px]] [[Lava]]'''
* Texture changed from [[File:Lava JE6.png|32px]].
** Lava texture side now has a bit of the water texture on top (best seen when blowing up TNT).

'''[[File:Water JE5.png|32px]] [[Water]]'''
* Changed texture from [[File:Water JE4.png|32px]].
** The water texture side now has a bit of the placeholder block texture on top (best seen when blowing up TNT).

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Controls]]'''
* The swing speed of the [[player]]'s arm is now slowed down to one swing per second when held, from 4.
** This is a hard limit. The arm will no longer swing faster if the player clicks faster.

'''Score points'''
* Changed score.
** [[Zombie]]s now give 80 points upon death.
** [[Skeleton]]s now give 120 points.
** [[Creeper]]s now give 200 points.
** [[Spider]]s now give 105 points.

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* Killing a spider during [[rain]] no longer crashes the game.{{verify|type=untestable}}

== Bugs ==
'''1 bug reported'''
* The game’s performance randomly drops excessively under certain conditions.{{cn}}
